name: Thrusta X
description:
Thrusta X is a unique and surprising combination of retro-style 2D shooter, adventure game, and puzzler.

The late Professor designed & built a craft to free the world of tyranny.
It is left to you & your faithful robot guide to undo the Darklord’s corruption of the world one mission at a time.
The souls of the Golden Lords must be freed.

Varied environments & evolving storyline.
Shoot to kill, shoot to solve puzzles.

2D, pixel-art-based graphics and full hi-def soundtrack.
60 FPS for fast and responsive gameplay.
Two difficulty levels.
Simple controls but varied play modes keep things interesting.
Eleven lands & 55 levels.
Xbox (or Xbox compatible) controller recommended.
